definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
dawn/morning/daybreak/day/dan, female roles in Chinese opera (traditionally played by specialized male actors)

sentences.english: Soon, Naaman drove his chariot to the Jordan and followed my command of dipping in the water seven times.
sentences.chinese: 我命令他“在约旦河沐浴七次”。

sentences.english: Joshua therefore commanded the priests, saying, Come ye up out of Jordan.
sentences.chinese: 你吩咐抬法柜的祭司从约旦河里上来。

sentences.english: Currently only Jordan's king has that right.
sentences.chinese: 目前仅约旦国王有任命首相的权力。
约旦政府现在已经被激怒。

sentences.english: The same is true in the West Bank and the Islamic world.
sentences.chinese: 约旦河西岸地区乃至整个伊斯兰世界也是如此。

sentences.english: This is the difference. The Sea of Galilee receives but does not keep the Jordan.
sentences.chinese: 加利利海接纳约旦河水但并不守着河一滴不放。

sentences.english: China narrowly beat Jordan Sunday night in the Asian Men's basketball championships final, 70-69.
sentences.chinese: 中国男篮在亚锦赛决赛中以70比69一分险胜约旦。

sentences.english: Then cometh Yeshua from Galilee to Jordan unto John, to be baptized of him.
sentences.chinese: 耶斯华从加利利来到约旦河找约翰，受他的洗。

sentences.english: During the same period, a Jordanian soldier had gone berserk and killed seven Israeli schoolchildren.
sentences.chinese: 其间，一名约旦士兵疯狂杀死了七名以色列学童。

sentences.english: Jordan's Tzu Chi organization once again travel to the Wadi Abdoun district to bring hot food to the tent city.
sentences.chinese: 约旦慈济志工前往洼地阿顿地区，为居民带来热食。

sentences.english: Their son Jordan also just climbed Mt.
sentences.chinese: 他们儿子约旦也刚刚攀登机译。

sentences.english: And Judah came to Gilgal, to go to meet the king, to conduct the king over Jordan.
sentences.chinese: 犹大人来到吉甲，要去迎接王，请他过约旦河。

sentences.english: A man pulls up an anchor line in Al Aqabah Harbor, Jordan.
sentences.chinese: 在约旦亚喀巴港，一个渔人拉起一根锚链。

sentences.english: Jordanian leader of al Qaida in Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克基地组织在约旦的领导人。

sentences.english: Jordanians rally to demand shoe tosser's release .
sentences.chinese: 约旦人集结要求扔鞋者的释放。

sentences.english: Also the same day, Jordanian Prime Minister Kevin Rudd held talks with Bakhit.
sentences.chinese: 陆克文当天还同约旦首相巴希特举行了会谈。

definition: United Arab Emirates/abbr. for 阿拉伯联合酋长国
